title: Chiropractic Services in Downtown Calgary
description: Energy Chiropractic is located in Downtown Calgary, AB. Dr. Jason Allison and his staff provide Chiropractic services, massage therapy, and acupunture.
cleaned_text: | | Phone: (403) 266-2428 | | Energy Chiropractic | | | | | | Energy Chiropractic of Calgary, AB provides heath care services in the areas of Chiropractic and Massage Therapy. We are located in downtown Calgary. Let us be your choice for a Calgary Chiropractor. Our Mission: To educate people about chiropractic and wellness. To provide a service that will bring you back to you natural state of wellness. Once wellness is achieved, provide a care program that will assist in maintaining a state of wellness. We use safe, gentle and effective techniques tailored to the specific needs and comfort of each individual. Affordable chiropractic care programs for the individual and family. Chiropractic
